name: Krab's Run
description:
My game I made for the I Can't Draw 2 game jam, and first proper game I've made ever.

Play as a crab and try to run towards the end of the level while avoiding dangerous hazards like ducks.

It's a bit it short and unfinished, but at least it's "beatable".  I made it in just 4 days, and ran out of time.  So I'll probably continue the development after the jam is over.

Credit to Kevin MacLeod for the gameplay music.
